column5: The weekend started for me on Friday night.  Up till midnight packing the boat and all the gear.  Got up at 3 in the morning to go to the cottage.  Had to boat into the cottage in the pouring rain.  As soon as the boat was unpacked out fishing I went.  On my third cast I landed into a 21 inch (no signage for the contest) 4 pound largy.   The weeknd was hot action all the time.  The rain let up and the fish just kept on hitting.  There were a lot of trucks and trailers at the landing, but no boats on our lake, not a problem for me.  The last cast of the day landed me a 20 inch 6.8 pound large mouth.  It was short for what it was.  It was a football.  Tall, huge, I wish the pictures showed it better.  We called it a weekend early and came home Monday morning.  I was tired from lifting a bunch of heavy weights, and my wife was homesick.   Went back out on Canada Day here at home with my wife.  The action was just as good here, although everybody said it sucked?  Tamara (my wife) managed to finally catch her first fish, a 2.5 smallie.  She was exstatic, as was I.  We quickly had to turn around to hit the same spot to get the rest of them for her.  For a lousy weather weekend, I forgot all about it because I was into so many fish.  I wish it could always be like this.
Yikes! That is one fat bass! Drop-shotting cheeseburgers were ya? -Brian

Nice bass! Here's a pic of a bass I picked up last weekend! http://good-times.webshots.com/photo/22727...103676882LKDtMl Been sitting in a warehouse for 35 years and a family member had been hiding it from me all that time! Got it and an amp for nothin and I couldn't be happier... OOOPS... wrong kinds bass! LOL It's cuttin into my fishin time! (Sorry for the hi-jack!) HH
Nice bass! I don't think that bass spawned yet! I usually catch a wack of Largies like that in the fall when they are putting on the feed bag. That guy has definitely been eating well.
LOL HH, I have a bass as well...although not as nice as that one.  Cranks....I caught some bass this weekend too....although not as nice as yours....LOL.
Holy moly thats a beaut, congrats...
Nice Bass Scott.  Good to see someone on team 7 is fishing. (I'm kinda experiencing DAD)
Now that's how you start the bass season.  Great job man.
right on right on  LMB are my fave. i dislike smallies
Now thats a bass!!  nice goin!
Very nice Bass cranks I just hope this one counts for your team.  It clearly states in the tourney rules your sign must include the year 2008 in the pic  I look forward to your next report.  MTP
Nice fat bass. Definately a great way to open the season! Congrats.
